results.description:
It’s time for the final confrontation with Ctarnidd of the Abyss, one of the Seven Colossi! As they take on his ultimate form, Sunraku’s party prepares to unleash their most powerful finisher—the killer move Armageddon, as provided by Psyger-0! “The true essence of life lies in conflict”…and now its shine is about to reach the god in his abyss!

Chapter Titles

  • Chapter 196: Holding The Heavens Aloft, United (Part 24)
  • Chapter 197: Holding The Heavens Aloft, United (Part 25)
  • Chapter 198: Holding The Heavens Aloft, United (Part 26)
  • Chapter 199: Holding The Heavens Aloft, United (Part 27)
  • Chapter 200: Holding The Heavens Aloft, United (Part 28)
  • Chapter 201: Holding The Heavens Aloft, United (Part 29)
  • Chapter 202: Holding The Heavens Aloft, United (Part 30)
  • Chapter 203: Holding The Heavens Aloft, United (Part 31)
  • Chapter 204: Holding The Heavens Aloft, United (Part 32)
  • Chapter 205: Holding The Heavens Aloft, United (Part 33)
  • Original Story: That Face Always Seem To Cheer Me Up, Somehow
results.name: Volume 21

results.description:
With discussions about Eri’s wedding having come to a conclusion, Ami (kind of?) joins the race to win over Hayato! As the relationships at Familia gets more and more complicated, Hayato and Akane spend an exciting night together! Meanwhile, the livelihood of sister store Chiyoda Diner is threatened once again by Fuwa’s evil plotting! And the secret of how Sachiko and Masahiro ended up married is brought to light!

Even as the seasons change and summer becomes fall, this romance only continues to heat up!!
results.name: Volume 17

volume.name: The Café Terrace and its Goddesses

results.description: The summer festival marks a momentous occasion for Rintaro and Kaoruko as their relationship reaches new heights, amid an outpouring of feelings and a poignant recollection of their first meeting. Now a couple, the two cautiously navigate what that means both for their own interactions, and how they interact with those around them—friends and schools included. Luckily, there’s still time to find their footing, as summer vacation continues…
results.name: Volume 7

volume.name: The Fragrant Flower Blooms With Dignity

results.description: Day two of the Harvest Festival has dawned, but Iruma and Lied still have zero points. Hoping to turn their luck around, they decide to start searching for the mysterious Legendary Leaf!! But almost before he knows it, Iruma falls into the most horrible danger…!
results.name: A Long-shot Bet for the Upset

results.description: Poseidon Senior Executive Labrys reveals the full scope of the Apollo Seed Project and, in the process, attempts to recruit Robert Altman into the secret society’s fold. When Robert refuses, Caduceus sees him as a threat—both to the Apollo Seed Project and to his beloved master, Labrys. Ignoring Labrys’s orders to stand down, a crazed Caduceus moves to eliminate Robert. A final, fatal showdown now looms between the two. Who will be left standing?
results.name: Where Duty Ends and Devotion Begins

volume.name: Pandora In the Crimson Shell: Ghost Urn

results.description:
ENEMIES TO MARRIED--AND A SUDDEN LOVE TRIANGLE!

On their grandparents' orders, high school archrivals Saito and Akane get married! Things were looking dire after the first few fights, but the better they get to know one other, the more these enemies' hearts soften. Could they become friends--or even more? Meanwhile, at school, they're still keeping their marriage hush-hush. Enter Akane's best friend, Himari--who reveals her crush on Saito! How can Akane support her friend and keep her marriage a secret, and who will Saito choose?

Contents

  • Chapter 7: I Went on a Date with the Girl I Hate
  • Chapter 8: I Shared a Meal with the Girl I Hate
  • Chapter 9: I Took Care of the Girl I Hate
  • Chapter 10: I Got Told Off by the Girl I Hate
  • Chapter 11: I Got Clingy with the Girl I Hate
  • Bonus Chapter
  • Afterword
results.name: Volume 2

volume.name: I Got Married to the Girl I Hate Most in Class

results.description:
The girl Komura likes no longer forgets her glasses, and the pair have defined their relationship as a couple. Changes are on the horizon as middle school graduation fast approaches. Will Mie and Komura be able to keep their commitment to each other even while attending separate high schools?

The future may not be in focus, but they only have eyes for each other!
results.name: Volume 12

volume.name: The Girl I Like Forgot Her Glasses

results.description: A date with May turns deadly when Rivia is suddenly cornered by the enemy and given a choice—to return to her former addo or die. And ignorant of the danger they’re in, Kito and Swito take in a stranger they find out in the bitter cold. Their acts of kindness help the sayabito recover, but can they warm his heart enough to quell the killer voices in his head?
results.name: Volume 6

results.description: Senku and pals are determined to build the ultimate scientific creation—a time machine! But one day, they receive an ominous message from the future. This unexpected occurrence makes the time machine seem more possible than ever, but what’s the real reason behind the transmission?

Midoriya’s epic final battle with Shigaraki reaches its earth-shattering crescendo! With Danger Sense stolen away and the villain threatening to wipe Japan off the map, Midoriya has to get really creative with his Quirks to survive. The Second’s plan to smash the vestiges of One For All into the core of Shigaraki’s psychic space is the last chance the heroes have to stop All For One’s grand schemes from coming to fruition. But first, Midoriya has to land a solid punch!

Chapter Titles

  • Chapter 411: History's Greatest Villain
  • Chapter 412: History's Maddest Hero
  • Chapter 413: Leaden Mass
  • Chapter 414: Overlay
  • Chapter 415: Rejection
  • Chapter 416: Wrench It Open, Izuku Midoriya!!
  • Chapter 417: Shimura
  • Chapter 418: Meek Spirits
  • Chapter 419: Design
  • Chapter 420: From Aizawa
  • Chapter 421: We Are Here
  • Chapter 422: Izuku Midoriya Rising

ISBN-13: 978-1-9747-5588-2
results.name: Overlay

results.description:
It is revealed that Vamola, the girl found inside the kaiju suit, is actually a member of the once thriving Sumerian race from deep space! Unfortunately, her home world was attacked by the aliens presently targeting Earth, leaving her people scattered. She herself had been forced to plot her escape from the planet with a group of other women—including Banga, who found her as a child and raised her. Now, having learned of Vamola’s past, Momo and the others rise to action, but the aliens they face are a formidable enemy.

Chapter Titles

  • Chapter 103: Vamola 3
  • Chapter 104: Vamola 4
  • Chapter 105: Banga
  • Chapter 106: Vamola's Reasons
  • Chapter 107: I've Decided on Takoyaki
  • Chapter 108: I'm Gonna Kick Ya Into Tomorrow
  • Chapter 109: Mantis Shrimp's Calculation
  • Chapter 110: Wicked Power
  • Chapter 111: Everyone's Reconvened
results.name: Vol. 13

results.description:
HAL JORDAN: CURSED!

Hal Jordan has been overcome by his curse and has turned his sights on Jo!

Can the new Lantern figure out how to hold her ground, or will her light be extinguished for good?
results.name: Episode Three: The Philospher's Stone

results.description:
BATGIRL CONTINUES TO UNCOVER HER MOTHER'S UNTOLD HISTORY IN PART TWO OF "THE BOOK OF SHIVA"!

Sandra and Carolyn Wu-San have taken to the streets of Detroit and become the champions of Chinatown--but what happens when they meet the deadly fists of Richard Dragon and the Bronze Tiger?

Meanwhile, who is the dark shadow that stalks the young Lady Shiva by day and haunts her dreams by night, and how do its revelations affect Cassandra Cain in the present?

Get ready for the deadliest, most action-packed issue of Batgirl yet!
results.name: The Book of Shiva, Chapter 2

results.description:
CAREFUL WHAT YOU WISH FOR, BARBARA GORDON--YOU JUST MIGHT GET IT.

The Birds investigate the disappearance of one of their own, hoping it will lead them to both their missing comrade and the truth about the mysterious villains attacking from the shadows.

Meanwhile, the Shadow Army makes another big move, with Oracle on the explosive receiving end.
results.name: On the Run, Part 3 of 5

results.description:
THE AWARD-WINNG DC PRIDE CELEBRATES ITS 5TH ANNIVERSARY WITH AN ALL-NEW SPECIAL IN AN ALL-NEW FORMAT!

When a 100-year-old queer speakeasy-turned-bar-turned-restaurant-and-community-space in Gotham announces that it will soon be closing its doors, generations of patrons come to pay their respects--including Alan Scott, the Green Lantern. After all, this is the place where he and his first love, Johnny Ladd, long ago carved their names into the basement wall before it all went to hell...and a love lost is never a love forgotten.

But they weren't the only ones to put their names in the wall over the years, and suddenly queer heroes, villains, and civilians alike from across the DCU--the Question, Midnighter and Apollo, Harley Quinn, Green Lantern Jo Mullein, Bunker, Connor Hawke, and Blue Snowman among them--find them-selves spirited away to a strange alternate dimension that seems to provide everything they could possibly want...but at what cost?

In this single, oversized story of interweaving narratives, the vanished will need to come together and look into the very depths of the Starheart itself if they hope to escape that which ensnares them in this triumphant and timely story of community amid chaos!

THE ATOM PROJECT CRASHES TO A CLOSE!

It's the pulse-pounding finale to the Atom Project, as the fate of the future for metahuman power in the DCU hangs in the balance!

As our heroes stand shoulder to shoulder with the US military against the common enemy of Inferno, new alliances are forged in the most unlikely of places.

Plus, Dr. Ray Palmer's greatest scientific breakthrough leads to an existential crisis for everyone on planet Earth--and a fork in the road for the Justice League Unlimited.

Do not miss this epic conclusion to one of the most pivotal stories of the year!
results.name: Conclusion: The Long Road Home

results.description:
THE JUSTICE LEAGUE RETURNS TO LEGENDARY EARTH!

In the aftermath of last year's Justice League vs. Godzilla vs. Kong, Task Force X launches a plan to develop hybrid Titans that Amanda Waller can control to guard against future titan attacks on our Earth.

To stop Task Force X, the Justice League travels to Legendary Earth and must face the dangers of the Hollow Earth, Kong, and Godzilla, King of the Monsters!

volume.name: Justice League vs. Godzilla vs. Kong 2

results.description:
DISTURBING THE PEACE!

The GCPD descends upon Marshview with its sights set on everything Pamela Isley has built over the last year.

With her freedom shattered, her trust betrayed, and her home under assault...just how far is Poison Ivy willing to go in order to protect what's hers?
results.name: Chapter Thirty-Four

results.description:
A SECRET SIX SNAFU!

Just when their unconcealed hatreds (looking at you, Black Alice and Gossamer) and repressed attractions (don't get us started) are set aside long enough for their first mission, the Secret Six separate, and an unlikely few of their members get snatched off the chessboard. Hopefully, the fraction of the Six still standing find and rescue them, instead of just sending a thank you card to their captors.

Meanwhile, some-one's digging ever closer to the deadly trove of secrets walled off in Waller's brain, and the Squabbling Six are the only people on Earth with a chance to stop them!
results.name: Sin of the Past

results.description:
A LITTLE FREE TIME NEVER HURT...RIGHT?

When Blackfire's latest doomsday machine backfires and blows up her entire invasion fleet before the Titans can leap into action, our heroes are left with a free afternoon. Good thing there's a giant sack of (Justice League) fan mail to answer!

Everything's fine until they open a "special delivery" from one of the League's greatest foes: an Amazo robot that'll crush the Titans with its own powers! And until the postal inspector shows up, don't open other people's mail, kids.
results.name: Going Postal

results.description:
The second volume in manga creator Atsushi Kaneko’s cyberpunk retelling of the timeless, Eisner Award–winning Dororo by “God of Manga” Osamu Tezuka.

Hyaku has been betrayed. A fearsome killer, her body more machine than flesh, she has learned the truth: Her human body parts were bartered away when she was a baby, and what remained was left for dead. Filled with incandescent rage, Hyaku embarks on a vengeful rampage to dismantle the monsters who took her apart and violently reclaim what she has lost. But as she replaces her cybernetic implants with the flesh and blood she has been denied, a new emotion sets in: fear. Fear that her human body will be too weak to finish what she started — and fear of what she might learn next about her own past. Will her anger and ruthlessness be enough to propel her to the final showdown? Or will revelations about the depravity of her world consume her, along with everyone around her?

Originally serialized from 2019–2021 in the Japanese manga monthly TezuComi, Search and Destroy is a brilliantly-crafted thriller about an outsider looking for meaning and vengeance in the unjust world that took everything away from her. Kaneko populates a stunning, high-contrast setting that echoes the post–Cold War former Soviet Block as much as it does Tokyo, with an unforgettable cast of scrappy heroes and skin-crawling machine-monsters on a nonstop ride full of action and suspense. This authorized retelling updates the rebellious '60s spirit of the original Dororo to the equally tumultuous 2020s, mixing Tezuka's signature dark yet playful storytelling sense with Kaneko's own wide range of influences which include Western cartoonists like Daniel Clowes and Charles Burns as well as filmmakers like David Lynch. The result is not only one of the best sci-fi manga of recent years but also one of the most visually rich and distinctive works of graphic storytelling in any genre or language.
results.name: Vol. 2

results.description:
THE SECOND ARC OF ABSOLUTE SUPERMAN BEGINS HERE!

The next big arc of this red-hot series begins here, as Superman finds himself caught between the opposing forces of the nefarious Lazarus Corp and the mysterious Omega Men.

But Kal-El just wants to be left alone in the only place on this planet where he's ever felt safe. A place called Smallville.
results.name: Superman, Son of the Demon, Chapter One: Lazarus, Come Forth

results.description:
A LOST ADVENTURE OF THE JUSTICE SOCIETY OF AMERICA!

A tale from the early days of the Justice Society of America!

As the dust from World War II settles, the JSA makes its way into Europe to recover the powerful artifact that prevented it entering the warfront...the Spear of Destiny!
results.name: The Unnamed Ones

results.description:
VENOM VS. ANTI-VENOM!

If Flash Thompson doesn't take down the new Venom, his superiors will make sure it's Dylan Brock who pays the price.

But now that Flash knows who the new Venom is, can he pull the trigger on the human being underneath? And if he can't...which sinister Spider-villain is waiting in the wings to do it for him?

NO HOPE AGAINST THE HOBGOBLIN!

As HOBGOBLIN's assault tears SPIDER-MAN's mind (and limbs) apart, Kingsley unleashes his wrath on those nearest and dearest to Peter Parker.

And this is a deadly race against time Spider-Man can't afford to lose - even as he risks losing his sanity to win!

THE FIGHT OF HIS LIFE!

Matt Murdock has been INFECTED!

A monstrous new fungus has wormed its way through the city and, now, into Matt's very pores! Literally up to his nose in the most repulsive textures, tastes and tones he's ever encountered!

HAS HIS RADAR SENSE FINALLY MET ITS MATCH?!

And what familiar face is responsible for putting DAREDEVIL down for the count?!
results.name: Rites of Reconciliation Part Three

results.description:
Doctor Strange has been covering up a murder in an attempt to solve it. But Thor and Sif don't see it that way!

Stephen scrambles to get to the bottom of the mystery and clear his name - with some help from Loki and Clea!

THE DEVOURER OF WORLDS BATTLES THE SPIRIT OF VENGEANCE!

  • GALACTUS roams the cosmos in search of sustenance he extracts from thriving planets, leaving them as dying husks.
  • GHOST RIDER, Johnny Blaze, punishes souls who are deemed worthy of vengeance.
  • What happens when these two powers collide?
  • Find out when superstar artist JUAN FERREYRA joins J. MICHAEL STRACZYNSKI for the penultimate pairing across the mighty Marvel landscape.

HELLFIRE & HULKS DON'T MIX!

The HELL HULK brings rage wherever it goes, and HELLVERINE can't stop it alone! The HELLFIRE WARRIORS return as PROJECT HELLFIRE brings out the big guns.

But what is their true goal? And what IS the Hell Hulk really?
results.name: Laboratories of Hell

results.description:
THE LAST STAND!

  • The omens could no longer be denied. The prophecy could no longer be delayed. The hour had come.
  • Now the Odinson stood between the Gods of Utgard and all they would break asunder...and he stood alone.
  • This is the story of the IMMORTAL THOR...and how he faced his end.

JONATHAN HICKMAN, FEDERICO VICENTINI AND IBAN COELLO TAKE ON THE UNIVERSE!

A sweeping Marvel cosmic event!

Imperial is a story of intrigue, mysteries and war, which takes place against the backdrop of the formation of new galactic order in the Marvel Universe.

Featuring HULKS, BLACK PANTHERS, NOVAS, GUARDIANS and COSMIC KINGS and QUEENS.

It's the must-read book of the summer!
results.name: One

results.description:
HAPPINESS IS AN ADAMANTIUM CLAW!

  • LAURA has the love of her life in JULIAN KELLER. Can they put WOLVERINE and HELLION behind them, or is the perfect life always out of reach?
  • What BETRAYAL will sever Laura's trust in LOGAN?
  • Find out in this special legacy #75 issue of Laura's solo series!

THE FUTURE OF THE MARVEL UNIVERSE IS HERE!

The future of the Marvel Universe is here as two of the most visionary creators in comic history show you THE WORLD TO COME!

The King of Wakanda is DEAD, leaving unguarded the world's most advanced technology, most precious metal, and a cryptic vault of dark secrets while triggering global conflicts among Marvel's heroes, villains and mutants.

With T'Challa gone, the future of the Marvel 616 Universe will be determined by a final tribal challenge for the Wakandan throne and the mysterious victor who will change Wakanda, and the Marvel Universe, forever.

MARVEL KNIGHTS visionary creators JOE QUESADA & CHRISTOPHER PRIEST collaborate on a future of the 616 through the lens of the revolutionary MARVEL KNIGHTS line of books that changed comics as we know it. You do not want to miss this landmark project!
results.name: Part One: The Death of Kings

volume.name: Marvel Knights: The World to Come

results.description:
PRISONER OF WAR!

  • RED HULK emerges from nuclear fire in LATVERIA!
  • An angry hive of DOOMBOTS is ready for war with THUNDERBOLT ROSS!
  • But when the U.S. MILITARY arrive with a special weapon, who will they aim it at?

NO GODS, NO KINGS!

Ghost-Spider has used the power of the Cosmic Cube to bring King Loki to a desolate planet he created and abandoned. Gwen only wanted to convince Loki to give up his designs for possessing the Cosmic Cube and reshaping the universe, but the remaining monster population has other plans for their former god king. Throw Ouroboros of the TVA into the mix and you've got an adventure you won't want to miss!

THE GALACTIC CHASE TO END ALL CHASES!

  • PHAEDRA (from HAN SOLO & CHEWBACCA) has stolen thousands of credits from JABBA THE HUTT and now AURRA SING, ZAM WESELL, BANE MALAR and the entire galaxy is after her...
  • ...including JEDI KNIGHTS QUI-GON JINN and SHAAK TI!
  • Guest-starring: JANGO FETT!

A CALL TO ARMS!

  • The GIOS under attack! REPUBLIC forces outnumbered and outgunned!
  • With the BATTLE FOR ERIADU and the fate of the Republic hanging in the balance, JEDI MARSHAL KEEVE TRENNIS addresses the galaxy!
  • The end of the war is coming, but who will pay the ultimate price?

volume.name: Star Wars: The High Republic [Phase III] – Fear of the Jedi

results.description:
• ETERNITY has grown desperate. He abducts a powerful cosmic entity and hides them in the STORM SANCTUARY, STORM's floating home in Atlanta.
  • What is the identity of this cosmic entity? How will this act complicate the ongoing investigation of the FEDERAL BUREAU OF INVESTIGATION into STORM? Find out in this next chapter of the goddess' saga.

MILES MORALES CAUGHT IN THE MIDDLE OF A UNIVERSAL COLLISION!

Two of today's most exciting writers, DENIZ CAMP (ULTIMATES) and CODY ZIGLAR (MILES MORALES: SPIDER-MAN), join forces for an adventure that will change Miles Morales- and the Ultimate Universe - forever! Drawn by rising star JONAS SCHARF, the brilliantly moody artist who brought you ULTIMATE UNIVERSE: ONE YEAR IN and DARK X-MEN...

Before The Maker remade Earth-6160, he left Miles Morales the key to reach his new universe...and when Miles' baby sister, Billie, uses it to travel to the Ultimate Universe, it's up to Spider-Man to save her!

But the Ultimate Universe is never safe for any Spider-Man! When the Spot attacks, Miles will have to team up with an all-new Peter Parker - and that's just the start of his journey across Earth-6160...

REUNION WITH THE OPPOSITION?

Guest artist Alex Lins (NAMOR) takes Wolverine on a psychedelic journey through his mind as familiar and unfamiliar faces of the Opposition try to untangle Logan's Winter Soldier programming!

Disaster charges toward the town of Merle, Alaska, as the X-Men are preoccupied with their own battle against the 3K X-Men. Only Magneto stands between the town and destruction - can he prevail even in the face of his deteriorating condition?

めめちゃんのママが描いた絵本の題名は『キュートピア』。リコピンたちの世界はママが創ったものだったの？　キュートピアの世界の不思議が明かされるキュートでちょっぴりブラックなファンタジー、最終巻!!

Chapter List

  • 144　リコピンコレクション
  • 145　TO M

  • 156　爆発
  • 157　真の乙女
  • 158　夢ハラ
  • 159　NEVER ENDING CUTEPIA
results.name: Never Ending Cutepia

results.description:
無抵抗の占い師・アタリを容赦なく傷つける天弓。その非道な姿を目の当たりにして怒りに震えるシンは、ついに坂本家の家訓を…？　大切な人を守るため、一線を越えようとするシンの心に、仲間の声は届くのか!?

Chapter List

  • DAYS191　運のツキ
  • DAYS192　本音
  • DAYS193　天弓VSシン
  • DAYS194　タキサイキア
  • DAYS195　知ってる
  • DAYS196　出会い
  • DAYS197　シートベルト
  • DAYS198　便利なやつ
  • DAYS199　イカリ
results.name: Tenkyū vs Shin

results.description:
志ぐま一門解体から3年――。　日本落語界から突如消えた朱音の姿はパリに…！　芸術の都で朱音が魅せる新たな高座とは？　そして、海外修業の意味が明らかになる時、一生の口から“志ぐまの芸”への道筋が語られる――。進化して帰国した朱音が突き進む二ツ目編、満を持して開演!!

Chapter List

  • 第百四十二席　新たな歩み
  • 第百四十三席　こわいこわい
  • 第百四十四席　在る
  • 第百四十五席　見てなよ
  • 第百四十六席　帰ってきた
  • 第百四十七席　最強かもよ
  • 第百四十八席　二ツ目編 開演
  • 第百四十九席　解く
  • 第百五十席　お門違い
results.name: Futatsume-Hen: Kaien

results.description:
文化祭の売上対決での特別企画、ボーナス争奪戦に挑む家庭科部員。対するはアイドル幻獣組（ユニコーン）の有栖の三つ子達。勝負の行方は…!?　そして祭のあと、十三の前に少年が一人…。

Chapter List

  • page 80　あつまれ！ボーナス争奪戦!!
  • page 81　つけ麺を食うのだ
  • page 82　文化祭エピローグ
  • page 83　犬飼カケル
  • page 84　辛口ジンジャエール
  • page 85　シスコーン対ツナコーン
  • page 86　大狼急襲
  • page 87　決戦
  • page 88　伝説の殺し屋の最期
results.name: Densetsu no Koroshiya no Saigo

results.description:
唐突に決まったカンナとの遊園地デート。1日の最後に乗った観覧車では、殿一とカンナの距離も超急接近!!?　そして一学期も終わりに近づいた三者面談の日。バイクで颯爽と現れたのは、まさかの妃眞理のお母さんで…!?　女子高生社長×家事代行ラブコメ!!

Chapter List

  • No.26　ホームメイドカンナ
  • No.27　ホームメイトカンナ
  • No.28　ホームメイトカンナ2
  • No.29　三者面談
  • No.30　ほのてん！
  • No.31　モヤモヤひまり
  • No.32　お休み終業式
  • No.33　波打ち際のヒロイン
  • No.34　波打ち際のヒロイン2
results.name: Namiuchigiwa no Heroine

results.description:
抜け忍トビの奇襲を退け無事戻ったヨダカに、心から安堵するアオイ…。そんな彼女に、ヨダカは胸に異変を覚えるようになってしまう!!　しかも、新たな護衛忍者のスズメがアオイの「恋人役」に名乗りを上げ!?

Chapter List

  • 第17話　骨の折れた日
  • 第18話　可愛い小鳥
  • 第19話　スズメの気持ち
  • 第20話　雨の帰り道
  • 第21話　9号部隊
  • 第22話　般若の上司
  • 第23話　通信不能
  • 第24話　赤いカワセミ
  • 第25話　あなたにお似合い
results.name: Anata ni Oniai

results.description:
トゲアイスとの魔法狩り対決の最中に突如現れた、最凶の敵・反世界の魔法。魔女協会が長年追う敵に対し、イチは自身が狩った魔法と共に立ち向かう――!!　圧倒的な力を前に苦戦を強いられるが、デスカラスの登場で戦況に変化が…!?　反世界の攻撃が刻一刻と町民に迫る中、現代最強魔女による反撃が始まる――!!

Chapter List

  • 第17狩　身の程知らず
  • 第18狩　深淵の魔女　デスカラス
  • 第19狩　魔法心円
  • 第20狩　予言の魔女
  • 第21狩　生き方
  • 第22狩　師弟血判状
  • 第23狩　苛虐のゴクラク
  • 第24狩　魔男とゴクラク
  • 第25狩　幸福の国
results.name: 【Hansekai no Mahō】

results.description:
爆弾テロの標的になった豪華客船エルフィ号！　新婚夫婦に扮して犯人を確保したシドとフランベリ警部だったが、爆弾を抱えたもう一人の犯人が、単独行動のエリオに迫る…!!　そして沈没危機に避難を急ぐシドを待ち受ける最悪の展開とは…!?

Chapter List

  • case.8　愛の天秤と彼女の覚悟
  • case.9　姿なき愛好家と名探偵の決意
  • case.10　たゆたう名探偵は湯花の誘いに瀕する
  • case.11　名探偵は久方の帰省に共闘する
  • case.12　絢爛たる令嬢のとある非日常
  • case.13　名探偵は朱唇の桃花に屈託する
  • case.14　宵闇の猫は敵陣情勢を俯瞰する
  • case.15　怪異は時に名探偵を蠱惑に誘う
  • case.16　追跡する彼女と可憐なる内包コンフリクト
results.name: Sugata Naki Aikōka to Meitantei no Ketsui

results.description:
あるコンクールをきっかけにピアノの世界を離れた、元天才ピアニスト・夜創一郎。もう二度と弾けないと思っていた彼の前に、200年前にこの世を去ったクラシック音楽の巨匠・ベートーヴェンが突如現れ――？

Chapter List

  • #001　星と道化師
  • #002　夜創一郎
  • #003　玲瓏学園前
  • #004　DAY DREAM DAY BY DAY
  • #005　OVERLOAD
  • #006　Locked Memories
  • #007　転入学試験
results.name: Hoshi to Pierrot

results.description:
喧嘩最強と呼ばれる不良中学生・灰谷ノボルは定年間近の教師にサッカーでの勝負を挑まれる。ボールを一度も奪えない灰谷は、勝負を繰り返す内に、サッカーにのめり込んでいく。しかし出場した初めての試合で惨敗、悔し涙を流す。そして灰谷は名門高校のサッカー部へ入部。サッカー界に、アウトローが殴り込み――燃え上がる高校サッカードラマ!!

Chapter List

  • 第1節：灰谷ノボル
  • 第2節：遭遇
  • 第3節：蛇と鷹ともう一匹
  • 第4節：前半
  • 第5節：無人地帯
  • 第6節：もう一回
  • 第7節：最高戦力
results.name: Haitani Noboru

volume.name: The Amory Wars: Good Apollo, I'm Burning Star IV, Volume II - No World for Tomorrow

results.description: Hudson Tremaine has seen it all, but that doesn't mean she can't bite off more than she can chew from time to time, especially when she's playing in a card tournament for the fate of reality. She might be intent on winning, but the truth of the Arcanos Mysterinos might be more than even she can handle!

Tree and Andrea set out on a mission to rescue everyone’s favorite Russian child assassin Mikhail.

Meanwhile, Thorne’s ultimate plan begins, and Abigail Jenkins will never be the same.
results.name: Chapter 22: The Orphan.

results.description:
The critically acclaimed team of storytellers Geoff Johns and Gary Frank return to the nuclear wasteland in the third volume of GEIGER!

On his quest to find a cure to his radioactive existence, Tariq Geiger, Barney, and Nate the Nuclear Knight come across a hidden community in the wastelands — one that offers an echo of what once was suburban America... and a hope for what it could be again. But dark forces in pursuit of The Glowing Man — namely Nate's former comrades-in-arms from the Camelot casino and their formidable leader, the New King — threaten to destroy it all, and only Geiger's unleashed rage can stop them. But will Tariq go too far? The answer: yes, and he will never be the same again.

This new edition also includes Geiger: Ground Zero #1-#2 that recounts the days soon after The Unknown War rained nuclear devastation across the U.S. Experience Tariq Geiger's earliest days as the Glowing Man, trying to survive his new normal and the hellish landscape left in the wake of war.

Collects Geiger Vol 2 (2024) #7-#9 & Geiger: Ground Zero #1-#2.
results.name: Vol. 3

results.description:
SNAKE EYES STRIKES

The G.I. Joe ninja team has infiltrated Springfield...but nothing is as it seems. Meanwhile, Dr. Mindbender has his revenge.

volume.name: G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero

results.description: The package is almost secured! Our crew is at the feet of Mechagodzilla! But will they kill each other before Godzilla gets the chance? Betrayal, infighting, and a double-cross that shifts the balance of the story! No one on this crew was honest about their lives, and that might lead to some very real deaths. One thing we do know: Mechagodzilla is about to come online, and one of these two-timing crooks will be in the pilot seat.

volume.name: Heat Seeker Exposed: A Gun Honey Series

results.description: Jin shares Razel’s escape plan with the slaves, but will they put their faith in a band of strangers? Back at the camp, Kaya is shocked by the return of someone from her and Jin’s recent past.
results.name: Kaya and Slave Mine 7: Part Two

volume.name: Let This One Be a Devil

results.description:
The Rangers might finally have their powers, but they still have a long way to go before they’re a real team.

They’ll need to learn fast though, as one group delves into a mysterious and potentially dangerous underground labyrinth known as The Belly, while another explores a more… diplomatic solution to rescuing Mark.
They know the truth. They’ve read the signs. Only they know what is really happening in donut shops across America. It’s time for the world to see.
results.name: Jaeger Bomb

volume.name: Runescape: Untold Tales of the God Wars
The Sixth Gun: Road to the Six

results.description: Kane battles from the Barbery Coast, across Southern Europe, to the canals of Venice, as a band of rogues forms around him in their quest for the fabled Serpent Ring of Set!
results.name: Till Death Do Us Part

results.description:
THE ENDGAME CONTINUES!

Jim Downing battles the dark, addictive force of the HELLSPAWN entity while struggling to recall his past. After waking from a memory-less coma, Jim grapples with a violent power that surfaces under stress, becoming embroiled in a conspiracy involving agents from Heaven and Hell, and receiving dubious assistance. Jim's quest for identity reveals unsettling truths about his past, while the Spawn entity within him grows stronger, deepening his dependence on its power.

Collected in an all-new size and format,SPAWN ORIGINS HARDCOVER BOOK 16brings you the art and stories that made this series a classic. Extra features include a cover gallery and behind-the-scenes art.

Collects SPAWN #189-200

Lore War, Part 5. Armed with the knowledge of how to defeat Lore once and for all, Sisko and what's left of his crew scatter to the four quadrants of space. Spock, Hugh, Alexander, and Paris each set out alone on a mission to save their remaining friends from Lore's control, but none is more alone than Sisko. He's taking the fight directly to Lore in a final all-or-nothing standoff. Will he and the actions of his crew be enough to restore the universe and everyone to their rightful selves? Or will Lore win again and reset the universe as he's done so many times before?
results.name: Lore War Part 5

results.description: IDW and VIZ Media present the shinobi showdown of your dreams in this action-packed crossover finale! The Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles and Team Seven have defeated the Foot Clan’s mutated forces, but the battle is far from over: Using the power of the ooze, Oroku Saki has abandoned his humanity and transformed himself into the monstrous Shredder. As he seeks revenge against Big Apple Village, it’s up to our heroes to end Shredder’s path of destruction and challenge the cycle of hatred consuming him. The fight you’ve been waiting for is finally here—Naruto vs. Shredder!

volume.name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles x Naruto

results.description:
NO FATE BUT WHAT THEY MAKE!

The story of the darkest days of the war against the machines, and the grizzled veteran who helped guide John Conner to his ultimate victory over Skynet, comes full circle in this issue, leading inexorably to a final, fatal confrontation — or so it might seem!

The enhanced neural nets of author DECLAN SHALVEY and artist COLIN CRAKER descend into the uncanny valley with The Terminator #8 — fortified by flawlessly fabricated covers by SHALVEY, EDWIN GALMON, CAT STAGGS, and DAVID COUSENS!
results.name: Systems Check

results.description:
MINISERIES FINALE

The end has come. No one will ever be the same.

What would Jesus do?

This deluxe presentation in STUNNING FULL COLOR also features another installment of Cutting Room Floor and creator commentary?

volume.name: Wynd: The Power of the Blood
